subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Nordic Combined (Winter Sport Event)
lead_paragraph: Todd Lodwick, 37, a skier competing in his sixth Olympics, was named on Wednesday as the flag-bearer of the United States for Friday’s opening ceremony of the Sochi Games.
snippet: Todd Lodwick, 37, a skier competing in his sixth Olympics, was named on Wednesday as the flag-bearer of the United States for Friday’s opening ceremony of the Sochi Games.
